keywords: toilet humor,animated sex,animated nudity,disability,gross out humor
name: Spike and Mike's Hilarious Sick and Twisted Festival of Animation

review.name: Makes me want to puke and that a good thing
review.reviewBody: I have to disagree with the other comment that was posted. Although the content on this DVD is sick and disgusting for the sake of being sick and disgusting, that is completely the point of Spike and Mike's. I've been attending the festivals for a couple years now and always enjoy seeing cartoons that almost make me puke. This may not be the greatest adult cartoon collection, but it is one of the better ones in my opinion.
